sourcesContent:
{/* Metinler bölümü */} {({ isVisible }) =>
Welcome to my Portfolio

{`Hi! I'm Gizem`} {text}

I am a 3rd-year Computer Engineering student at Trakya University. By prioritizing my studies, I managed to achieve the top position in my class with my grades from the 1st and 2nd years. I have learned programming languages such as Python, C, 8086 Assembly, Java, Flutter, and React.Throughout my academic journey, I have honed my problem-solving and analytical skills, maintaining an open attitude towards learning and keeping myself updated with industry innovations. As an energetic and ambitious aspiring computer engineer, I am eager to gain experience in the software world.

} {/* Resim bölümü */}
